ComicInfo.Summary:
THE SMASH HIT CONTINUES! The mysteries of the deathmatch arena grow deeper as the Rat reveals the secret of the prison's ominous Light Guards. And as the second stage of the tournament looms, which heroes will fall in the final battles of the opening round?
Written by industry legend Paul Jenkins (SENTRY, INHUMANS) and drawn by comics superstar Carlos Magno (PLANET OF THE APES, TRANSFORMERS), DEATHMATCH is a dark, psychological deconstruction of the superhero genre that can't be missed.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 08:15:37. [CVDB388578]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Archie Van Buren, Blond, Michael Garland
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Archie Van Buren, Blond, Carlos Magno, Jung-Geun Yoon, Whilce Portacio
ComicInfo.Characters: Abnormal Girl, Adolf Hitler, Berserk, Dog 54-Alpha, Dragonfly, Electronika, George Truman, Hater, Manchurian, Meridian, Mink, Nephilim, Omni-Engine, Professor H. Higgins, Sable, Sol Invictus, The Collective, The Glyph, The Mutate, The Rat
